title: Data Cleaning and Exploration
description: Perform data cleaning and exploratory data analysis (EDA) on the given dataset using Python libraries such as pandas, numpy, and matplotlib. Submit your findings as a Jupyter Notebook file.

title: Machine Learning Model Evaluation
description: Train a classification model on the provided dataset and evaluate its performance using accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. Submit the report and code files.

title: Group Project - Web Development
description: Build a full-stack web application as a team. The group leader will submit the final project on behalf of the entire group.
